OutputPins.Name: Global
OutputPins.Tooltip: Real time. Always at the same speed, unaffected by world simulation speed.

OutputPins.Name: World
OutputPins.Tooltip: World simulation time. Affected by simulation speed (slow-motion) and world paused state.

OutputPins.Name: Position
OutputPins.Tooltip: The vertex position. For vertex shaders this is the local position, for pixel shaders it is the transformed position.

OutputPins.Name: Normal
OutputPins.Tooltip: The vertex normal. For vertex shaders this is in local space, for pixel shaders it is in world space.

OutputPins.Name: Tangent
OutputPins.Tooltip: The vertex position. For vertex shaders this is the local position, for pixel shaders it is the transformed position.
